definition: to resist/imperial/(classical) to drive (a chariot)/to manage/to govern

sentences.english: Many years ago, my granduncle is a chef there.
sentences.chinese: 很多年前，我的舅父是裏邊的御廚。

sentences.english: Soon the royal cook came to kill the willing victim on the block.
sentences.chinese: 很快，御廚來宰殺砧板上心甘情願的犧牲者了。

sentences.english: Sometimes, when he was too busy, the royal cook would do this.
sentences.chinese: 有時，他太忙了，將是御廚來殺鹿。

sentences.english: The imperial cooks prepared lunch for the emperor every day.
sentences.chinese: 御廚們每天都爲皇帝準備午膳。

definition: full moon/first full moon after birth (i.e. entering the second month)
Kaesong or Gaeseong city in southwest North Korea, close to the border with South Korea and a special economic zone for South Korean companies
smile spread across the face (idiom); beaming with pleasure/all smiles/joy written across one's face
ta-a noodles or danzai noodles, popular snack originating from Tainan
to try to answer a question (in a quiz, guessing game, riddle etc)/quiz game
to make a significant advance in one's career (idiom)/to get one's big break
Yancheng district of Kaohsiung city 高雄市[Gao1 xiong2 shi4], south Taiwan
Temujin, birth name of Genghis Khan 成吉思汗[Cheng2 ji2 si1 han2]
